description.value:
School transmutation; Level druid 3, hunter 3, ranger 3, spiritualist 3, summoner 3, unchained Summoner 3; Domain Scalykind 3; Subdomain Cannibalism 3, Fist 3;

Casting Time 1 standard action
Components V, S, DF

Range close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
Targets one living creature
Duration 1 hour/level
Saving Throw Will negates (harmless);  Spell Resistance yes

Description

This spell functions like @Compendium[pf1.spells.cfzk3vkv1c7ncaug]{Magic Fang}, except that the enhancement bonus on attack and damage rolls is +1 per four caster levels (maximum +5). This bonus does not allow a natural weapon or unarmed strike to bypass damage reduction aside from magic.

Alternatively, you may imbue all of the creature's natural weapons with a +1 enhancement bonus (regardless of your caster level).

Greater magic fang can be made permanent with a @Compendium[pf1.spells.nsxngq65mbrzgwnm]{Permanency} spell.

data.shortDescription:

Alternatively, you may imbue all of the creature's natural weapons with a +1 enhancement bonus (regardless of your caster level).

Greater magic fang can be made permanent with a @Compendium[pf1.spells.nsxngq65mbrzgwnm]{Permanency} spell.
